name: Dino Fight's
description:
Do not have a story behind it, just get out, and kick everybody (spacebar to kick).                                                                                                                                                                                                                 

In future versions I plan to add:  better AI behaviours, more enemys, local multiplayer, controller friendly, better musics e sfx.

A big thanks to @ScissorMarks (Follow him on twitter!!!), for creating dino characters sprites. You are awesome!

Link for his amazing dino sprites:  https://arks.itch.io/dino-characters
